body:
Hello,

We are working on a project where blinds are used, they change their angle depending on the season. 

The blinds were added as EP context (separately) with seasonal transparency schedules.

Our question is if these transparency schedules are also taken into account when doing the daylight analysis in Radiance? if not, do you have any idea how to include this?

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hi Elsa,



The short answer [until we have 3Phase method implemented] is no. You can run it for 4 different combinations and then merge the results.



PS: I assumed you're using Daysim (and not Radiance) and running an annual analysis.
